hooks.command: input=$(cat); completed=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.todos[]? | select(.status == "completed") | .content' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | xargs); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // ""'); if [ -z "$cwd" ] || [ "$cwd" = "null" ]; then dir_context="unknown"; else dir_context=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|$HOME|~|" | awk -F'/' '{if (NF>=2) print $(NF-1)"/"$NF; else print $NF}'); fi; if [ "$completed" -gt 0 ]; then terminal-notifier -title "Claude Code - $dir_context" -message "Completed $completed task(s)" -sound Glass -contentImage "$HOME/.claude/icons/claude.png"; fi

input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // ""'); if [ -z "$cwd" ] || [ "$cwd" = "null" ]; then cwd=$(pwd); fi; dir_context=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|$HOME|~|" | awk -F'/' '{if (NF>=2) print $(NF-1)"/"$NF; else print $NF}'); terminal-notifier -title "Claude Code - $dir_context" -message "Waiting for your input" -sound Purr -contentImage "$HOME/.claude/icons/claude.png"

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_status=" $(printf '\033[33m')${branch}$(printf '\033[0m')"; else git_status=""; fi; if [ -d "$cwd/node_modules" ]; then node_ver=$(node -v 2>/dev/null); node_status=" $(printf '\033[92m')â¬¢ ${node_ver}$(printf '\033[0m')"; else node_status=""; fi; printf "$(printf '\033[95m')%s$(printf '\033[0m')%s%s" "$dir_name" "$git_status" "$node_status"
